question: Tī-ê sî-kan 2014 chì 2017, nā-bōe hâm chong-kè, ū siáⁿ chi̍t hāng siong-gia̍h bōe chhut ê siong-phín ê si̍t-ek chu-sòan chin tōa?
2016 kap 2017 nî ê lóng-chóng sió-khài-sǹg boán-khì ê chóng-ê sī tó-chi̍t-ê?
Koa-chin ê tū-sū ê lūi-hêng ê koat-sū sī chin chē ê sî-kî? I ê chóng-tī sī siáⁿ-mih?
Koa-koa chin-tiâu ê 'tsung-kuan chham-ú' ê kî-bīn tùi 2013 kàu 2016 ê kái-piàn chhoaⁿ-siâⁿ?
answer: Chhiaⁿ-thin chin-sî. 2013 nî sī $632 pah-bān, 2014 nî tiāⁿ tio̍h kiám-chió liáu 66% kàu $215 pah-bān, liáu-āu thiah-thiⁿ kàu siōng koân ê $1812 pah-bān tī 2015 nî, liáu-āu tō kiám-chió liáu 98% í-siōng chiâⁿ-chòe $30 pah-bān tī 2016 nî. Bô it-tēng ê cheng-tiǎng ia̍h-sī kiám-chió.

question: Liāu siáⁿ-chiáⁿ ê tì-bū chéng-lūi, tī 2013 nî ê hiah-ê kî-kan hē-chōe hūn-á-kîuⁿ pí $0 khah koân, koh bô hāi-chè 2015 nî í-āu ê hāi-chè?
2013 nî ê choân-pō͘ hō͘-chhut tiong, sǹg sī 'sòaⁿ-chîⁿ tōe-ōe hō͘-chhut pān-hoat' ê tiâu bô-chē?

Nā-sī 'credit facilities' ê '$ 1800' pah bān-tâⁿ tī 2015 nî tōaⁿ-khì, chiū-sī kā i chiap-sòaⁿ pun hō͘ 2016 kap 2017 nn̄g tang, 2016 nî ê 'total commercial commitments' ê sin ê chióng-ài hōe-sòan siáⁿ-choá?
Tùi chit-ê piáu lâi kóng, chi̍t ê jīm-bū ê chóng-chēr kap i lîm-sî ê nî-chiah ê sò͘-ba̍t, ū bô chi̍t khoán bêng-hián ê koan-hē-chè?
answer: Bô, bô chi̍t khoán ti̍t-chiap ê koan-hē-chè. Chìn-chi̍t-pō͘ lâi kóng, chhit-lâm sū-liāu tāi-piáu chi̍t khoán tò-lián ê koan-hē-chè. Siāng tōa ê jīm-bū, 'sìn-iōng tiâu-kiāⁿ' ($1800T), lîm-sî tī chi̍t nî lāi (2015) lóng thè-tiāu. Ūi-sī, 'pāi-chè' ($307T), sī siāng sió ê jīm-bū chi-it, i hām só͘ lia̍t ê 6 ê sî-kan tōaⁿ lóng pau-hâm.

question: Tī hō-suànn ê kî-kan chhut-khì ê lìng-sînn hō-chòe siáⁿ-chi̍t ê bô-chòe ê sêng-chiap lūi-hêng ê sò͘-ba̍k siōng-kóe sió?
answer: amount of commitment expiration per period 2016
amount of commitment expiration per period 2017
amount of commitment expiration per period after 2017

question: Chit koe-jit ê kim-tin sî-kan ê lóng-chóng kiat-sûnn-kè siâⁿ tōa, thang su-iàu jīn-chek ê nî-tō͘ sī ūi-hē, pēng-chhiáⁿ chiūⁿ-su tōa-pâi ê lí-iû?
answer: 2015 nî sī chi̍t ê chin bêng-hián ê siâⁿ tōa ê nî-tō͘, kiat-sûnn-kè lóng-chóng sī $1812 pah-bān. Chit ê sò͘-jī chin koân, pí tē-jī koân ê nî-tō͘ lóng-chóng ($632 pah-bān tī 2013 nî) thòe 2.8 pèi koh khah chē, pí pa̍t-ê nî-tō͘ ê sò͘-jī (tī $10 pah-bān kàu $215 pah-bān) koh chin chē.

question: 2013 niá kàu 2017 niá, siâⁿ-phiah tông-chham lūi-ke lóng-kè ūi-tōa-sò͘?
